org.openbase.bco.dal.remote.service

Class AbstractServiceRemote<S extends Service,ST extends com.google.protobuf.GeneratedMessage>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openbase.bco.dal.remote.service.AbstractServiceRemote<S,ST>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - generic definition of the overall service type for this remote.
    ST - the corresponding state for the service type of this remote.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, ServiceProvider, ServiceRemote<S,ST>, org.openbase.jul.iface.Activatable, org.openbase.jul.iface.Initializable<rst.domotic.unit.UnitConfigType.UnitConfig>, org.openbase.jul.iface.Lockable, org.openbase.jul.iface.Manageable<rst.domotic.unit.UnitConfigType.UnitConfig>, org.openbase.jul.iface.provider.PingProvider, org.openbase.jul.iface.Shutdownable, org.openbase.jul.pattern.provider.DataProvider<ST>, org.openbase.jul.pattern.Remote<ST>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivationStateServiceRemote, BlindStateServiceRemote, BrightnessStateServiceRemote, ColorStateServiceRemote, ContactStateServiceRemote, EmphasisStateServiceRemote, HandleStateServiceRemote, IlluminanceStateServiceRemote, MotionStateServiceRemote, PowerConsumptionStateServiceRemote, PowerStateServiceRemote, PresenceStateServiceRemote, SmokeAlarmStateServiceRemote, SmokeStateServiceRemote, StandbyStateServiceRemote, TamperStateServiceRemote, TargetTemperatureStateServiceRemote, TemperatureStateServiceRemote

    public abstract class AbstractServiceRemote<S extends Service,ST extends com.google.protobuf.GeneratedMessage>
extends Object
implements ServiceRemote<S,ST>
    Author:
    Divine Threepwood

      • waitForData

        public void waitForData(long timeout,
                        TimeUnit timeUnit)
                 throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                        InterruptedException
        Method blocks until an initial data message was received from every remote controller or the given timeout is reached.
        Specified by:
        waitForData in interface ServiceRemote<S extends Service,ST extends com.google.protobuf.GeneratedMessage>
        Specified by:
        waitForData in interface org.openbase.jul.pattern.provider.DataProvider<ST extends com.google.protobuf.GeneratedMessage>
        Specified by:
        waitForData in interface org.openbase.jul.pattern.Remote<ST extends com.google.protobuf.GeneratedMessage>
        Parameters:
        timeout - maximal time to wait for the main controller data. After the timeout is reached a TimeoutException is thrown.
        timeUnit - the time unit of the timeout.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case the any error occurs, or if the given timeout is reached. In this case a TimeoutException is thrown.
        InterruptedException - is thrown in case the thread is externally interrupted.
